title: RNA Biology & Biotech
description: This course covers fundamental concepts of RNA biology as well as state-of-the-art biotechnologies that make use of RNA.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
